content: You might experiment with setting folders to threaded and possibly adjust whether new tab or window opens with new message (done in Settings pane), but I am unaware of any ability to read and respond in same window.
creator: davidsk

content: Try without having your antivirus scanning outgoing mail. Or even with it turned off as outgoing email go into the system temp folder while sending and antivirus is more than capable of hanging the send process long enough for it to time out.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thanks Matt. I went to try your suggestion but, after 3 days of problems, my emails with attachments seem to now be sending correctly (or at least the couple of tests I just did did so), so no point or capacity to test your idea. But I will remember it if the fix turns out not to be sustained. Cheers.
creator: grantdixon

content:
So you want someone to spend an hour explaining to you how IMAP and POP work.

Fundamentally you will not have a delay with mail in your inbox in IMAP mail accojnts where the server supports push notification via the IDLE IMAP command (that iu google, others may support it. Check with your provider).

Otherwise you are limited to the frequency of mail checking in your account settings.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Toto se děje ve všech mailech? Zkus Thunderbird spustit do Režimu řešení potíží (z nabídky Nápověda).
creator: poljos-moz

content: Tlač emailu bez hlavičky: - Thunderbird - Označím email na vytlačenie - Prejdem do spodného okienka s textom emailu - v spodnom okienku je vpravo hore dlaždica "Ďalšie" - Klik - "Tlačiť" - Klik - a vytlačíte iba to, čo vidíte v spodnom okienku.
creator: Ansamb
